term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - dose in radioanalytical chemistry
term.title: dose

item.text: A general term denoting the quantity of radiation or energy absorbed. For special purposes, it must be appropriately qualified e.g. absorbed, maximum permissible, mean lethal.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1540 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
